subject: Auto-assign images to cells, add page nav to header, fix multi-page export
body:
- addImage now auto-assigns to first unoccupied image cell based on layout
- Header split: title + page selector (top), action buttons (bottom)
- Mobile header: compact page nav (arrows + count) on right side
- Multi-page export: use double rAF + increased delay for reliable capture
- Always restore original page after export (was stale closure comparison)
